markdownRemark.html:
JAMstack, J means Javascript, A means api which can be interact whit other services,

M is Markup for pre-rendered, that means the web app should have the fontend

isolated from back end. It will speed up the web app, cache extensively, more focus on

the interaction with user. JAMstack may take the web app to easy to develop, deploy,

scale, operate.

The origin blog is Your next app may not have a backend
